%d points de répit supplémentaires si votre groupe comprend au moins une Abomination, une Fauconnière, une Furie ou un Lépreux.
Nous ne sommes que des rats pour ces vautours !
Nous sommes la proie ! C’est leur chasse !
N-Non ! J’ai survécu à l’horrible prédation toute ma vie, je ne peux pas finir comme ça !
J-Je ne suis pas un chasseur ! Je suis une imbécile cherchant une vie qui ne me correspond pas !
Je n’été jamais prête pour cette vie. J’aurais dû rester le mouton que j’étais !
Recule ! L’un de vous est un traître, j’en suis sûre !
Est-ce elle qui vous a envoyé !? Des chiens perfides habillés comme des héros saints !?
Brigands ! VOUS TOUS !!!
L’Homme est une chose terrible, je n’aurais jamais due voyager avec vous, monstres !
Des loups habillés en moutons. J’aurais dû le savoir.
J’ai infligée tant de douleur aux autres, maintenant c’est à mon tour de souffrir...
Cicatrices sur le corps, pour correspondre aux cicatrices sur l’esprit !
PRENEZ MA CHAIR, MISÉRABLES !
La douleur vas m'absoudre de mes péchés !
La douleur est un cadeau aux vivants, et je la chérirais !
Populace inutile ! Vous n’aurez jamais pu survivre dans des conditions dans lesquelles je prospérait !
Imbéciles ! Vous TOUS ! Pas mieux que des enfants !
Vous aurez du garder vos maisons confortables ! Votre douce éducation est évidente en voyant vos agitations embarrassantes !
Vos vies confortables vous ont tous rendus faibles, pas mieux que ces pathétiques demoiselles !
Incroyable. Ma survie est menacée par les crétins obtus que vous êtes !
Uniquement compter sur moi-même m’as rendue aussi faibles que ces malheureuses fillettes !
J’ai survécue à de nombreuses nuits avec seulement cette oiseau. Je ne vais pas commencer à compter sur un groupe d’étrangers baffouillants !
La survie des plus aptes qu’il disaient...
Vous êtes tous des poids-morts, et je n’hésiterais pas à sacrifier vos vies pour la mienne.
Je n’ai jamais aimé quiconque d’autres que moi-même. Cela reste vrai en ce moment même !
La vie que j’ai vécue... Les morts que j’ai causée... Je ne mérite pas de survivre...
Peu importe ce que je fais, j'atterris au même endroit... Un animal de compagnie, obéissant aux ordres de son maître...
J’ai justifiée leur mort par mon besoin de survivre, mais je vois ce que ça à fait de moi...
Ma haine de la faiblesse, de l’humanité, de moi-même... Je veux qu’elle s’arrêtent toutes...
Je n’aurais jamais la vie que j’ai voulue. Autant en finir maintenant...
CROA CROAAAAAA!!!
Envolez vous ! Nous leur survivront dans le ciel !
Nous sommes un cycle ! Nous mourons et revenons !
N’aies crainte, malheureuse demoiselle ! Je te sauverais de ton destin macabre !
Le rituel ! ON A OUBLIÉ LE RITUEL !!!
Ces bêtes vont se fatiguer ! Nous allons survivre !
Nous avons survécu jusqu’à maintenant ! Nous ne tomberons pas aujourd’hui !
La force et la persévérance garantissent la survie. Nous nous battrons !
Laissez vos esprits chanter ! Nos cris seront connus de tous !
Je ne suis troublée par aucune bête, car je suis chasseur et elles sont mes proies !
Prenez l’initiative ! Le premier coup est tout ce qui compte !
Le chasseur dirige depuis l’Apex !
Nous sommes l’Apex, les chasseurs ultimes ! Nous n’avons rien à craindre de ces créatures impies !
J’ai survécue aussi longtemps avec de la volonté et mon esprit, et je ne mourrais pas maintenant !
Il n’y a rien d’assez terrible pour me briser, j’ai survécue à tout !
Peu importe les chances, je survivrais par la ruse et ma détermination!
J’ai combattu des hommes tout comme j’ai combattu des bêtes, cette menace ne me trouble pas !
Nous avons l’aide d’un très bon chasseur. Nous l’emporterons !
J’ai déjà subit la colère d’un héros, et je sais que la nôtre doit être crainte !
Voyez les comme nos proies, et vous frapperez avec l’esprit d’un prédateur !
L’oiseau distrait nos adversaires, c’est maintenant qu’il faut saisir votre chance !
Une opportunité se présente ! Il est l’heure du coup fatal !
Ils sont vulnérables ! Frappez maintenant !
J’ai endurée une vie entière de tourment. Une bataille de plus ne me déconcerteras pas !
Je survie là où une personne inférieure ne pourrais pas !
Pourquoi risquer nos vies pour cette tâche sans but !?
L’oiseau craint ces monstres, et nous le devrions aussi !
N-Non ! Je ne veux pas mourir ! Je vous en suppliiiiiiie !!
L’Homme est le plus dangereux des prédateurs, et je vais prends grand soin de garder mes distances face à vous !
Gardez vos distances, à moins que vous vouliez perdre un oeil !
Votre regard de prédateur n’arrive pas à cacher vos intentions meutrières !
La douleur me forge en un grand chasseur !
Ils ont souffert grandement avant leur morts. Je souhaite expériencer le souffrance qu’ils ont eu !
Plus de cicatrices, PLUS DE CICATRICES !!!
Une vie de confort vous a tous rendu faibles, et INUTILES !
Montrez vous utiles et TUEZ LES, BONS SANG !
Vous êtes tous faible, retenus par vos propres codes sans importances. Vous seriez plus utile comme appât.
J’ai fais tout le travail, la récompense me reviens !
L’oiseau m’obéit comme si j’étais sa reine. Vous devriez faire de même !
Couvrez moi, ignorants ! Je suis vulnérable aux attaques !
Je suis devenu une chasseresse inhumaine, j’ai fait proie des faibles pour trop longtemps...
Je me pensais plus haut qu’eux, mais maintenant je vois...
Dans chacun de leurs visages terrifiés, je vois mon reflet...
Le cerveau d’un oiseau est le plus grand qui puisse être !
Pourquoi suis-je née de sang ?! Je souhaite n’être qu’un avec Mère !
MÈRE !!!
S-S’il vous plaît ! Je vais me repentir, épargnez-moi !
Trop proche ! TROP PROCHE !!!
J’accepte mon rôle de subordonnée, maintenant laissez moi vivre je vous en prie !
Je me sentirais en sécurité seulement si personne n’est dans mon dos !
Qu’est-ce que tu essaye de faire ?! Passe devant moi !
Je ne peux distinguer alliés et ennemis, alors je resterais proche de la sortie !
Viens plus près ! Laissez nous nous battre comme de vrais bêtes !
J’entre volontiers dans la tanière du prédateur !
Je garde toujours mes distances, mais ça va changer aujourd’hui !
Ils font la parade nuptiale ! Je vais les rejoindre !
Vous me défiez ?! J’ACCEPTE !
Cette créature a l’air délicieuse ! Laissez moi goûter un peu !
Mince ! J’ai oublié ma capuche de robin ! Je reviendrais bientôt !
CROAAAAA !
J’ai fais pousser mes plumes et je vole !
Peut-être que mon sacrifice feras justice pour les innombrables vies que j’ai prises...
Reste mon amis, il est temps que je parte....
J’en ais assez de fuir mon destin. On ne se souviendra pas de moi comme d’une lâche...
S’il vous plaît, il y a encore tant de choses que je dois faire ! Tant de choses pour lesquelles je dois répondre !
N-Non ! Je ne suis pas prête pour la mort ! Pas encore !
Je suis esclave à mes instincts de survivaliste !
C’est à moi ! À MOI !
Écartez-vous de ma récompense !
Il y a ma marque dessus ! ÇA M’APPARTIENT !
Ceux qui sont rapides survivent !
Vous les avez provoqués, donc vous allez les affronter !
J’ai une chance de survivre, vous non.
Je joue un rôle que je ne devrais jouer. Je n’ai jamais été destinée à être le redoutable chasseur que je ne suis pas !
Je ne suis qu’une souris, prise au piège dans le regard glouton de son prédateur !
Je comprends maintenant, la peur paralysante que ces pauvres femmes ont senti dans leur dernier moments !
Je n’aiderais pas les alliés qui seront bientôt mes ennemis !
Je suis trop occupée à sauver ma peau pour agir !
Nul ne sait ce qui est vraiment le meilleur pour moi, donc je ne prends soin que de moi-même.
Laisse tomber, je cherche à survivre à cela, avec ou sans toi.
Je ne vais pas me jeter bêtement dans leurs coups.
Continuez. Je préfère observer d’une position sûre.
Chacune de mes actions n’as jamais que blessé plus de gens. Pourquoi gâcher l’effort ?
*sanglots* Pourquoi est-ce que je pleure ? Je suis pathétique...
Je suis une criminelle qui doit être punie. J’ai accepté mon destin, laissez-moi.
Vous n’avez pas danser, alors moi non plus.
Ne me provoquez pas, sinon je m’envoles au loin!
Je suis faucon en chemise de nuit. Je dois chercher une proie !
Chaque mouvement, chaque mot est une tromperie ! Je ne peux que me fier à mes instincts !
L’Homme est imprévisible, je prends action par moi-même!
Je suis l’arbitre de mon propre destin !
Avec dents et ongles, je combattrais comme ces bêtes le font !
Écorchant et griffant, une manière vicieuse de se débarrasser d’un adversaire !
Oui, OUI ! La douleur mène chacune de mes actions !
Je marque, vous tuez. Simple enough for you dimwits?
Regardez le maître faire, novices.
C’est comme ça qu’on fait ! Idiots !
Mettez vos ordres là où je penses ! Je me suis fait chasseuse !
Je n’écoutes personne !
J’ai été obéissante pour trop longtemps ! Il est temps que je prenne les choses entre mes propres mains.
Venez, créatures ! Achevez-moi !
Il semble que je vais devoir attirer leur attention.
Ici ! Terribles créatures !
CAAAAWWWWWW!!!
C’est mon territoire, envahisseur !
Est-ce que tu danses avec mon COMPAGNON ?!
La Mère viendra pour moi, et ma mort ne sera pas rapide !
Je ne voulais pas tuer cette pauvre fille. Maintenant je suis traquée jour et nuit pour l’avoir fait !
Des bruits dans les ténèbres! Sont-ils déjà arrivés !?
Quelqu’un mange plus que leur ration, je le sais !
Je ne serais pas surprise si vous aviez été payés pour me tuer. Je serais vigilante cette nuit.
Vous cherchez mes moments de faiblesse, mais vous n’en trouverez aucun !
Aidez moi à compter mes blessures ! J’en ai accumulée de nombreuses nouvelles !
J’ai appris à l’oiseau à picorer mes croûtes. La douleur me garde éveillée la nuit !
Ah, oui, cela se développera en une magnifique cicatrice !
C’est ça. Reposez vous confortablement comme les moutons de ville que vous êtes.
Bande d’ingrats. Nous ne sommes vivant qu’à cause de mon dur labeur !
Tout ce que vous faite c’est manger, comme un nid d’oisillons.
Je mangerais ce que je veux. Pas de partage.
Ces rations sont gâchés par vous, donnez-les moi.
J’ai récoltée ces rations, donc elles m’appartiennent.
Je suis pire que la plupart des monstres que nous combattons... Comment pouvez vous me faire confiance ?
Si vous saviez ce que j’ai fais, vous penserez que je suis un monstre, moi aussi...
Je ne serais pas surprise si vous m'abandonniez...
Cela sera ma zone, ne me dérangez pas !
Où-y-a t-il un grand arbre ? Je dois faire mon nid.
Je chevaucherais mon loyal faucon. Il me portera au Hameau cette nuit !
Je suis une cible d’un assassinat. Je ferais en sorte à ce qu’on le sache !
Reculez ! Je deviendrais la diversion !
Comme dans les vieux livres, "les cicatrices me rendent magnifique !"
Achevez-moi bon sang. Je mérite de brûler en enfer pour ce que j’ai fais...
Sauvez-vous. Mon âme est déjà partie depuis longtemps...
Cette armure est trop lourde ! Il vaut mieux être rapide que robuste !
*montre ses dents* RA CACAAAAWWWWW!!!
Vous traquez un chasseur. Ce destin n’est de la faute de nul autre que vous même !
Je vous ai fait croire que c’est vous qui me trouviez !
Et si je vous débarassais de ces yeux malicieux ?
Vous pensez que je suis vulnérable ? Pensez encore !
Je vie selon un code simple. “TUER LES FAIBLES".
Je me fiche des conséquences ! Votre existence m’enrage et je vous ferez mordre la poussière !
Une blessure fraîche fera toujours bouger les lâches !
Vous avez tituber devant ma flèche. Cette malchance est le résultat de votre stupidité !
Flute ! Des flèches volent dans toutes les directions !
Il est l’heure de la danse des flèches !
Ah oui ! Je peux toucher le mannequin d’entraînement de notre ennemi en plein dans le mille !
SCROA CROA!
Mon carquois est plein. Je dois planter ces flèches dans ma propre chair !
Un peu de douleur est ce dont j’ai besoins pour continuer à faire couler le sang !
J’ai fait tant de mal. Ce sera la seule chose que je fais de bien...
Si nous cherchons à détruire le mal, alors je dois être la première à partir...
Je suis un arbre ! Ces flèches seront mes branches !
Oui, oiseau! Atterrit sur mon visage ! C’est un lieu de nichage doux et confortable !
Vous essayez de me laisser aux vautours ? Essayez encore !
Vous m’avez mis dans cet pétrin, maintenant vous allez mourir pour ça !
Que le cycle recommence...
La chasse est terminée, pour nous tous...
Fuir ? Pourquoi ? La fête ne fait que commencer !
Il n’y a rien à craindre des blessures ! Elles vous renforcent !
LA DANSE N’EST PAS TERMINÉE !!!
OU EST MÈRE ?! JE VEUX MA MAMAN !!!
Ah, non! Je me soumet ! Laissez-moi juste vivre !
*pleurs* Nooonnnnn !
You all let that hit me! TRAÎTRES !!!
Qui m’a poussée ?! L’un de vous m’as poussée !
Pourquoi moi ?! Frappez-les plutôt ! Ils sont une proie plus facile !
Imbéciles ! PROTÉGEZ-MOI !!!
Plus, donnez moi PLUS !!!
Oui ! Cette blessure mérite sa place !
CUI CUI !
ENVOLEZ-VOUS !!!
Un teste de force, mais je ne suis pas un homme !
Comment ai-je pus être touchée ?! Pourtant je vole !
Arrêtez de me tourmenter bestioles ! Finissez-en !
Non ! Arrêtez ! PITIÉE !!!
Un autre de vos tours, traîtres ?!
Vous m’avez déjà eu une fois ! Je ne me ferais pas avoir par un acte aussi prévisible !
Viens ici, bête, je suis juste là !
Donne-moi toute ta colère, horrible chose !
Une danse majestueuse, oui !
Ridicule créature ! Tu ne peux pas me frapper tant que je suis dans le ciel !
C’était ma prise espèce de voleur !
Cette bête avait mon nom dessus, crétin !
Faux ! Tout FAUX!!!
Est-ce que tu sais au moins où il faut mettre le bout pointu ?!
Quelle forme maladroite ! Tous vos mouvements sont faux !
Vous vous déplacez comme l’un des nôtres, mais pouvez vous VOLER comme l’un des nôtres ?!
On ne peut pas le tuer ! Nous devons fuir !
C’est futile, ces bêtes ne meurent pas !
Quel est cet acte cruel ?! Êtes vous tous contre moi ?!
Je ne peux pas me fier à ce que je vois dans cet enfer !
Fait attention, malotru ! Tu m’as presque touchée !
Regarde-toi, tu trébuches sur tes propres pieds. C’est ridicule.
C’est une bonne chose que je ne comptais pas sur vous pour toucher votre coup.
Vous n’êtes que de la populace inutile. Au moins les criminels et coupe-gorges étaient compétents.
Pauvre idiot, vous pensiez pouvoir toucher un oiseau !
MÈRE !!! IL RUINE MON PLAISIR !!!!
Ils me gardent pour la fin ! Une punition sadique pour mes sombres actions !
Je ne peux supporter tout cela ! Je ne veux pas souffrir dans mes derniers moments !
Un acte malin, mais je ne tomberais pas dans le piège !
Bien, ça me permet de ne pas le faire moi-même.
Cette blessure deviendras une magnifique balafre !
Je donnerais n’importe quoi pour être à ta place tout de suite !
Les faibles meurent. C’est aussi simple que ça.
Vous montrez votre douleur avec tous vos gémissements. Vous êtes faibles.
Tu as été choisi !
*regard curieux*
Ces créatures sadiques ! Elles continuent de jouer avec moi tandis que ma fin approche !
N-non ! S’il-vous-plaît ! Je me rends ! Épargnez moi la douleur de la mort !
Vos ruses idiotes ne m’auront pas, TRAÎTRES !
Ils forment une ligue, les preuves sont partout !
Vos danses sont horribles, regardez moi attentivement !
Vos pieds sont attristés. Ils doivent être apaisés pour réussir à avoir le flot de la danse !
N-non ! Ne me touchez pas ! Je suis consumée par mes peurs du passé !
*pleurs* Nonnn! Ne me regardez pas ! Je suis pathétique !
Qu’est-ce que vous faites ?! Ne me touchez pas avec vos mains sales !
Gardez vos distances, ou je planterais une flèche dans votre genou !
Se déplacer risque de me distraire de la douleur...
Je préfère saigner ici.
Où allons nous ?! Reste là où tu es, mouton !
Je me suis faite chasseresse. Je ne répondrais pas aux ordres de faiblards comme vous !
Ma place ! VOUS PRENEZ MA PLACE !!!
Mère m’as dit d’éviter les étrangers.
Une autre tactique de votre conspiration, hein ?
Qu’est-ce c’est que ça ? Une maligne création de la science ? Non merci.
Non non non. Cela soulagerait la douleur. Je veux l’AMPLIFIER.
Pourquoi voudrais-je faire disparaitre la douleur ? C’est un cadeau de la nature que nous avons tous !
Je suis une criminelle. Je ne mérite pas une telle gentillesse...
Je suis sûre que quelqu’un mérite cela bien plus que moi...
Ohh, cela ne ferait qu’ébouriffer mes plumes !
Je dois demander à Mère d’abord !
Une tromperie qui ne me trompera pas.
Tout ce qui n’est pas naturel est un poison pour moi.
Je peux m’occuper de moi-même. Gardez votre sorcellerie loin de moi !
N’interrompez pas mon plaisir !
J’ai pitié de vous, oublieux de délices si simples !
Non ! Ce sera ma blessure préférée !
Je vous en prie, ne prolongez pas ma souffrance...
C’est sans espoir, laissez-moi...
S’il-vous-plaît, sauvez votre peau...
Sorcellerie !
CROAA CROAAAA !
*hurlement bruyant*
Vous me préparez à l'abattage n’est-ce pas ?
Ah ! Vous devez me prendre pour une imbécile !
Bas les mains.
Je tire les forces dont j’ai besoin de cette douleur !
Le sang versé renforce ma volonté !
La douleur est tout ce dont j’ai besoin.
Je n’ai aucune motivation. N’essayez pas de changer cela.
Vous êtes trop gentils. Gardez votre assistance pour quelqu’un qui en vaut la peine...
Je suis vouée à un destin macabre. Vos efforts seraient en vain...
Quoi ? Pas de danse d’abord ?
Mais tu me prends pour quoi ?!
Non merci.
Aucune créature ne peut me surpasser !
Je réclame mon dû !
Nous triomphons une fois de plus !
Une proie facile.
Le cycle continue !
Nous sommes au top !
Créatures prévisibles !
La chasse est ruinée par cette abomination !
Les victimes de mon passé ! Elles sont innombrables !
Tous les choix que j’ai fait. Les gens que j’ai blessée !
J’ai vu des choses bien pire que les créatures que nous avons combattus. Il n’y a pas de raison de s’inquiéter.
Cet oiseau nous donne l’avantage sur nos adversaires. Nous prévaudrons.
Ils sont prévisibles, facile de les surpasser.
Ça pique au début, mais ça vas très vite soigner.
J’ai passée ma jeunesse à lire de nombreux textes. Ça m’as appris ce traitement.
Mord ce bâton, ça va faire mal.
Tu n’es pas mort, alors arrête de te comporter comme si tu l’étais.
Je ne le dis à personne, mais j’étais autrefois une jeune demoiselle. Je suis la preuve que tous peuvent changer pour le mieux.
N’ai pas peur, il y a une raison pour laquelle nous avons survécus aussi longtemps.
C’est une perte de temps ! Nous devrions juste prendre nos affaires et battre en retraite !
Un effort en vain, je suis chassée éternellement et rien ne les arrêtera.
Je ne peux pas jouer ce jeu avec vous alors que les créatures rôdent encore dans les ténèbres !
Je ne peux faire confiance à personne, surtout avec cette bande de mercenaires avares !
Je n’offre jamais mon aide à ceux qui ne la méritent pas.
Chiens déloyaux. Je garderais mes distances ce soir.
La douleur est naturelle, embrassez-la !
Laisse moi t’aider à développer cette blessure !
Une autre cicatrice, une autre histoire !
Bétail inutile. Pourquoi est-ce que je prendrais la peine ?
Cet oiseau se dévoue à moi. Il a plus de valeur que quiconque parmis vous !
Des citoyens, si impuissants.
Oh, les rations ont disparus ? C’est bien étrange.
Oh c’était pour toi ? C’est dommage.
Tu peux te plaindre autant que tu veux sur mes habitudes cleptomanes, mais ça ne changeras rien.
Je suis trop fatiguée pour continuer à vivre dans cet enfer.
Vous ne savez rien de mes misères, de mon envie d’arrêter tout...
Juste...laissez-moi me reposer...
Mais nous n’avons pas encore fait les rituels nécessaires !
*bruits de piaillements*
Ah oui ! Nous devons d’abord trouver le nid de Mère !
Attention, j’ai mis en place un piège, et pas un qui tue rapidement.
Gardez vos distances si vous voulez garder vos yeux.
Approchez un peu trop et vous perdrez cette main.
Ce ne sont pas des blessures, ce sont des trophées !
Non ! Ne me volez pas mes cicatrices !
Espèce d’écervelé ! Tu va rendre le problème pire !
Tu ne sais pas ce que tu fais, alors arrête d’essayer.
C’est bête de ma part. La gentillesse me rappelle toujours de la chose horrible que je suis devenue...
*sanglots* Peut-être dans une autre vie, je serais plus fière de ce que je suis...
CROA !
Êtes vous de la nourriture pour oiseau ? Non ? ALORS PARTEZ !
Je suspecte que cela soit poivrée de toxines.
La nourriture de la ville est de la nourriture empoisonnée.
Je dois rester légère pour la chasse de demain.
Un chasseur est bien plus vif en jeûnant.
Ce pain est trop gentil pour moi. Je ne peux accepter une telle offre...
Vous avez sûrement plus faim. Je vous donne ma part...
Ce n’est pas encore assez fermenté, j’attendrais que ça le soit !
Il semble que j’ai perdu mon bec. Je mangerais quand je l’aurais retrouvé.

Rien ne nous traquera ce soir, je vais m’en assurer.
Chaque flèche doit rester aiguisée. Chaque plume doit rester fraîche.
Un prédateur caché est souvent celui qui attrape sa proie.

Tunique, Cape

Une chasseresse qui coure, la Fauconnière utilise principalement des attaques rusées pour prendre l’avantage sur ses adversaires. Bien qu’elle soit plus compétentes dans les rangs arrière, la Fauconnière a tout de même des capacités variées pour l’aider à survivre face à ses adversaires, que ce soit avec des retraites minutés ou des attaques coordonnées avec son compagnon aviaire.

La Fauconnière dépends de ses tactiques pour se protéger. Bien que ses flèches et son oiseau n’ont pas autant de dégâts que les armes de ses alliés, elle est maître dans le harcèlement et les attaques répétées. Elle peut mutiler ses ennemis avec des tirs bien placés tandis que son Faucon sème la pagaille dans les rangs adverses.

Chassée par des Brigands qu’elle appelait autrefois “alliés”, la Fauconnière a appris des tactiques pour l’aider à survivre dans les situations les plus périlleuses. Elle peut se fondre dans son environnement et se reposer sur ses sens affutés et son Faucon pour être sûre qu’aucune créature ne la surprenne. Malheureusement, la prime de la Fauconnière la suit partout où elle va, et occasionnellement son groupe se trouvera réveillé par des tueurs envoyés par son ancien chef.
J'accepte mon destin. Je suis prête.
La Chasseuse Chassée
C’est une tueuse qui a commit des crimes inconnaissables, mais elle cherche une protection contre une menace plus grande encore...
Alliés Inattendus
Bien que leur crimes contre le Hameau ne peuvent être pardonnés, leur savoir des zones alentoures et leurs ennemis a une valeur inestimable.
Le plus dangereux des jeux

Une rare et effrayante créature a été aperçue dans les bois environnants. Des chasseurs experts sont appelés pour traquer et tuer cette bête avant qu’elle ne cause des ravages dans les fermes voisines.
Ne Tirez Pas sur l’Oiseau Moqueur

What is this?! I am fading from reality!
Oh no! I have become a phantasm!
I have become see through, what am I to do?!
I am corporeal again. What a relief.
My sensations return. Phew...
I am no longer phantasmal. I hope that does not happen again...
I feel a sudden rush of cosmic adrenaline!
I can feel it! The thrill of the hunt!
The rush of combat! this is what I live for!
Damn, the high is wearing away...
I have calmed down, for now.
The bloodlust dissipates...
My skin hardens, I am unkillable!
I am protected by some heavenly aura!
I have grown a thick skin!
It is gone. Damn, I could have gotten used to that...
I am mortal again. That is a shame...
My skin softens...
Perhaps my unsettling state can be of use!
I am a ghastly hunter, stalking my prey in plain sight!
Despite my circumstances, I am able to take advantage of this situation!
This unseen boon continues!
I am protected once more!
This unknown force continues to shield me. Convenient.
Best to focus on my survival in this situation.
I must be wary of any fatal blows!
I must maintain a steady defense.
Pathetic beast! They are distracted by the bird's movements!
I am the master of harrassment. I will enjoy toying with these fools!
They are blinded, now is our chance!
Shots to the appendages, they will not strike properly!
Hah! They fear me, as they should!
Does my reputation precede me? They tremble with dispair!
I usually do not dabble in poisons, but I've made an exception of this lot.
I have set a trap of vulture's acid upon them. Watch as they suffer!
I have started using poison-tipped arrows, and the effects are beginning to set in!
Do not wait to be saved like some needy damsel, become the heroes you want to be!
I have no war trumpets on hand, but let the adrenaline of combat inspire you instead!
Life is a fight for survival, so fight on!
My body pushes itself beyond its limits!
I am becoming numb to pain!
Pain doesn't matter, so long as I survive!
Um, I do not sing. But if I did, know that it would be very calming!
You want me to sing? Trust me, you will find the sound of battle more relieving.
If I pluck the string of my bow, would that suffice for singing?

Some classes are haunted by their past. For example, the Shieldbreaker is scarred from past trauma. She must navigate a series of seven flashback battles while camping. (One battle per camp.) Once those battles are completed, she can camp peacefully forever.
NOTE: The seven flashbacks are shared across the whole Shieldbreaker class. You don't have to do seven battles for each Shieldbreaker recruit.
Beware the Carrion Queen!
The presence of corpses allows the Talon Mother to revitalize herself.
The leader of the Talon Brigands lurks in the darkness. Be wary!
The Talon Mother arrives, seeking revenge for the lives you have stolen!

W-what have I done?!
I-I didn't mean to! It was a mistake!
Innocent blood on my hands! I-I am a monster!
I am now no better than the beast I harbor!
I-it was self defense! I swear!
What have I done!? I am no better than a criminal!
She was an innocent soul! How can I live with myself given what I hath done!
Another innocent life taken by me. I haven't changed...
She reminded me of myself...and that terrifies me...
I have killed a defenseless soul, I am not fit for a warrior's death!
I did it again...I am damned to make this same mistake...
How can I represent law when I have snuffed out the life of an innocent!
Another for the count, but this one was not deserving of this cruelty...
Such a shame...I would have liked to have had her for myself...
I cherish life, but this place has turned me into a king of death...
I fight to protect the weak, yet I am the one to deal the killing blow...

- {colour_start|bleed}SHE HAD SOFT SKIN. I ONLY WISH WE HAD MORE TIME TO PLAY WITH HER.{colour_end} - ...
NO MATTER WHAT I DO, I CAN ONLY DESTROY!

We are but rodents to these vultures!
We are the prey! This is their hunt!
N-no! I have survived gruesome predation all my life, it cannot end like this!
I-I am no hunter! I am a fool seeking a life unfit for me!
I was never fit for this life! I should have stayed the sheep that I am!
Back away! One of you is a traitor, I am sure!
Did she send you!? Treacherous cur dressed as saintly heroes!?
Brigands! ALL OF YOU!!!
Man is a terrible thing, I never should have travelled with you beasts!
Wolves in sheeps' clothing. I should have known.
I've afflicted so much pain on others, now it's my turn to suffer...
Scars of the body, to match the scars of the mind!
TAKE MY FLESH, YOU WRETCHES!
Pain will absolve me of my sins!
Pain is a gift to the living, and I cherish it!
You useless rabble! You could never have survived under the conditions I thrived in!
Stupid! ALL of you! No better than children!
You should have kept to your comfortable homes! Your soft upbringing is evident from your embarrassing flailing!
Your comfortable lives have made you all weak, no better than those pathetic damsels!
Unbelievable. My survival is being threatened by you thick-headed cretins!
To rely on anyone but myself would make me as weak as those unfortunate maidens!
I have survived many nights with only this bird. I will not begin to rely on a group of bumbling strangers!
Survival of the fittest they say...
You are all dead weight, and I will not hesitate to sacrifice your lives for mine.
I never cared for anyone but myself. That remains true to this moment!
The life I've lived... The death I've caused... I don't deserve to survive...
No matter what I do, I end up in the same place... A pet, performing a master's bidding...
I justified their deaths with my need to survive, but I see what it has made of me...
My hatred of weakness, of man, of myself... I want it all to end...
I will never have the life I want. It might as well end now...
CAW CAWWWWW!!!
Take flight! We can outlast them in the sky!
We are a cycle! We die and come back!
Do not fret, misfortuned damsel! I will save you from your grisly fate!
The ritual! WE FORGOT THE RITUAL!!!
These beasts will tire! We will survive!
We've survived this long! We will not fall today!
Strength and perseverance guarantees survival. We will fight on!
Let your spirits sing! Our cries will be remembered by all!
I am shaken by no beast, for I am the hunter and they are my prey!
Take the initiative! The first strike is all that matters!
The hunter rules from the apex!
We are the Apex, the ultimate hunters! We have nothing to fear from these unholy beasts!
I've survived this long through wit and spirit, I will not die now!
There is nothing terrible enough to break me, I have survived it all!
No matter the odds, I will survive through cunning and determination!
I've fought man and beast alike, this threat does not shake me!
We have the aid of a keen hunter on our side. We will prevail!
I have been on the receiving end of a hero's wrath, and I know that ours is a might to be feared!
See them as our prey, and you will strike with the mind of a predator!
The bird distracts our adversaries, now is your chance!
An opportunity presents itself! It is time for the killing blow!
They are vulnerable! Strike now!
I have endured a lifetime of torment. One more battle will not faze me!
I will survive where a lesser person would not!
Why do we risk our lives for this meaningless task!?
The bird fears these monsters, and we should too!
N-no! I don't want to die! Pleeeeasse!!
Man is the most dangerous predator of all, and I take great care to keep my distance from you lot!
Keep your distance, lest you want to lose an eye!
Your predatory gazes fail to hide your murderous intent!
Pain forges me into a greater hunter!
They suffered greatly before their deaths. I wish to experience the pain that they had!
More scars, MORE SCARS!!!
A life of comfort has made you all weak, and USELESS!
Make yourselves useful and KILL THEM ALREADY!
You are all weak, held down by meaningless self codes. You would serve better as worm food.
I've done all the work, the beast's prize belongs to me!
The bird obeys me as if I am its queen. You lot should do the same!
Cover me you dimwits! I am vulnerable to attack!
I have become an inhumane hunter, I have preyed on the weak for too long...
I thought myself higher than them, but now I see...
In each of their terrified faces, I saw a reflection of me...
A bird's brain is the largest of them all!
Why was I born of blood?! I wish to be one with the Mother!
MOTHER!!!
P-please! I will repent, just spare me!
Too close! TOO CLOSE!!!
I accept my subordinate role, now please let me live!
I will only feel safe if no one is at my back!
What are you trying to do?! Get in front of me!
I cannot distinguish friend from foe, so I will remain close to the exit!
Come closer! Let us fight like true beasts!
I willingly enter the predator's lair!
I always keep my distance, but that changes today!
They perform the mating dance! I will join them!
You challenge me?! I ACCEPT!
That creature looks delicious! Let me have a bite!
Oh shoot! I have forgotten my robin's hood! I will return shortly!
CAWWWWWW!
I sprout my feathers and fly!
Perhaps my sacrifice will provide justice for the countless lives I have taken...
Stay my friend, it is time I depart....
Enough running from my fate. I will not be remembered as a coward...
Please, there is so much I still need to do! So much I must answer for!
N-no! I am not ready for death! Not yet!
I am a slave to my survivalist instincts!
It is mine! MINE!
Back away from my prize!
It has my mark! It belongs to ME!
The quick survive!
You provoked them, so you will face them!
I have a chance at surviving, you do not.
I act a part that I should not. I was never meant to be the fearsome hunter that I am not!
I am but a mouse, ensnared in the gluttonous gaze of its predator!
I understand now, the paralyzing fear that those poor women felt in their final moments!
I will not aid allies that will soon turn to enemies!
I am too busy saving my own hide to take action!
No one can know what is truly best for me, so I look out only for myself.
Leave be, I aim to survive this, with or without you.
I will not blunder foolishly into their blows.
You go on. I prefer to observe from a safe position.
Every action I take only hurts more people. Why waste the effort?
*sob* Why do I always cry? I am pathetic...
I am a criminal that must be punished. I've accepted my fate, leave me.
You did not dance, so neither will I.
Do not provoke me, or I shall fly away!
I am a hawk in a nightgown. I must watch for my prey!
Every motion and word is a deceit! I can only trust my instincts!
Man is unpredictable, I take my own actions!
I am the arbiter of my own fate!
With tooth and nail, I fight as these beasts do!
Scratching and clawing, a vicious way to dispatch a foe!
Yes, YES! The pain drives my every action!
I mark, you kill. Simple enough for you dimwits?
Watch the master at work, you novices.
This is how it is done you fools!
To hell with your orders! I am a self-made hunter!
I listen to no one!
I have been obedient for too long! It is time I take matters into my own hands!
Come at me you beasts! End me!
It seems that I will need to get their attention.
Over here you terrible creatures!
CAAAAWWWWWW!!!
This is my territory, invader!
Are you dancing to my MATE?!
The Mother will come for me, and my death will not be swift!
I didn't mean to kill the poor lass. Now I am hounded day and night for it!
Noises in the dark! Have they come already!?
Someone is eating more than their share, I know it!
I would not be surprised if you were bribed to kill me. I will be vigilant tonight.
You look for moments of weakness from me, but you will find none!
Help me count my wounds! I have accrued many new ones!
I have taught the bird to peck at my scabs. The pain keeps me awake at night!
Ah yes, this will develop into a magnificent scar!
That's right. Rest comfortably like the city sheep you are.
Ungrateful lot. We are only alive because of my hard work!
All you lot do is eat, like a nest of fledgling birds.
I will eat what I want. To hell with sharing.
These rations are wasted on you, give them to me.
I gathered these rations, so they belong to me.
I am worse than many of the monsters we fight... How can you place your trust in me?
If you knew what I've done, you'd think me a monster too...
If you were to abandon me, I would not be surprised...
This will be my spot, do not intrude!
Where is a tall tree? I must make my nest.
I will ride upon my trusty falcon. He will carry me to the Hamlet tonight!
I am a target of assassination. I will make it well known!
Back away! I will become the diversion!
As the old tale goes, "Scars give me charm!"
End me already. I deserve to burn in the inferno for what I have done...
Save yourselves. My soul is too far gone...
This armor is too heavy! Better to be quick than sturdy!
*bares teeth* RA CACAAAAWWWWW!!!
You stalk a hunter. This fate is no one's fault but your own!
I led you to believe that you were the one stalking me!
How about I relieve you of those malicious eyes?
Think you caught me vulnerable? Think again!
I live by a simple code. "KILL THE WEAK."
I care not of the consequences! Your existence angers me and I will see you put to the dirt!
A fresh wound always gets the cowards moving!
You totter into my arrow's flight. This misfortune is a result of your stupidity!
Duck! Arrows fly in all directions!
It is time for the dance of arrows!
Ah yes! I can land my arrow on the bull's eye of that target dummy!
SCRAWWWCAWWWWW!
My quiver is full. I must stick these arrows within my own flesh!
A little pain is what I need to get the blood going!
I have done so much wrong. This will be the one thing I have ever done right...
If we seek to destroy evil, than I must be the first to go...
I am a tree! These arrows will be my branches!
Yes, bird! Land upon my face! It is a soft and comfortable resting place!
Trying to leave me for the vultures? Think again!
You got me into this mess, now you'll die for it!
Let the cycle start over...
The hunt is over, for all of us...
Run away? Why? The fun has just begun!
Scars are nothing to fear! They strengthen you!
THE DANCE IS NOT OVER!!!
WHERE IS MOTHER?! I WANT MY MOTHER!!!
Ah, no! I submit! Just let me live!
*crying* Nooooooooo!
You all let that hit me! TRAITORS!!!
Who shoved me?! One of you shoved me!
Why me?! Hit them instead! They are easier prey!
You idiots! PROTECT ME!!!
More, give me MORE!!!
Yes! This wound will be a worthy addition!
CAWWW!
FLY AWAY!!!
A test of power, but I am no man!
How was I hit?! I am flying!
Stop tormenting me you beasts! Just end it!
No! Stop! PLEASE!!!
Another one of your tricks, you traitors?!
You fooled me once! I will not fall for such a predictable act!
Come now beast, I am standing right here!
Give me your wrath, you horrible thing!
A mighty dance indeed!
Silly creature! You cannot strike me while I am in the sky!
That was mine you thief!
That beast had my mark on it you ditz!
Wrong! All WRONG!!!
Do you not know where the sharp end goes?!
Such clumsy form! You got all the moves wrong!
You move like one of us, but can you FLY like one of us?!
There is no slaying it! We must flee!
It is futile, these beasts do not die!
Is this some cruel act?! Are you all against me?!
I cannot trust what I see in this hell!
Watch it you oaf! You nearly hit me!
Look at you, tripping on your own feet. Laughable.
Good thing I wasn't relying on you to land a blow.
Bunch of useless rabble. At least the criminals and cutthroats were competent.
Silly man, thinking it can hit a bird!
MOTHER!!! THIS ONE IS RUINING THE FUN FOR ME!!!!
They save me for last! A sadistic punishment for the dark deeds I have done!
I cannot bare this! I do not want to suffer in my last moments!
A clever act, but I will not fall for it!
Good, saving me the trouble later.
That wound will grow into a beautiful scar!
I would give anything to be in your place right now!
The weak die. Simple as that.
You make your pain obvious with your whimpering. You are weak.
You have been chosen!
*curious staring*
Those sadistic creatures! They continue to toy with me in the wake of my imminent demise!
N-no! Please! I yield! Spare me the pain of death!
Your silly ruses do not trick me, TRAITORS!
They are in league, the proof is everywhere!
You all dance horribly, watch me closely!
Your feet are saddened. They must be appeased to achieve the flow of the dance!
N-no! Do not touch me! I am consumed by past fears!
*sobbing* Noooo! Do not look at me! I am pathetic!
What are you doing?! Do not touch me with your filthy hands!
Keep your distance, or I will place an arrow in your knee!
To move would distract me from the pain...
I am fine to bleed here.
Where are you going?! Stay in your place, sheep!
I am a self made hunter. I will not take orders from a weakling like you!
My space! YOU ARE IN MY SPACE!!!
Mother told me to avoid outsiders.
Another tactic in your conspiracy, eh?
What is this? Some malign creation of science? No thanks.
No no no. This would relieve the pain. I want to ENHANCE it.
Why would I numb myself to pain? It is a natural gift to us all!
I am a criminal. I do not deserve this kindness...
I am sure this is well deserved for someone other than myself...
Ooh, that would only ruffle my feathers!
I would have to ask Mother first!
A deception that I will not fall for.
Anything not of nature is poison to me.
I can care for myself. Keep your witchery away from me!
Do not interrupt my pleasure!
I pity you, oblivious to such easy delights!
No! This will be my favorite wound!
Please, do not prolong my suffering...
It is hopeless, leave me...
Please, save yourself...
Witchcraft!
CAWW CAWWW!
*loud screeching*
Readying me for the kill are you?
Ha! How foolish you must think I am!
Hands off.
I draw all the strength I need from this pain!
Spilled blood fuels my will!
Pain is all I need.
I have no motivation within me. Do not try to change me otherwise.
You are too kind. Save your aid for someone more worthy...
I am doomed to a grisly fate. Your efforts would be wasted...
What? No dance first?
What do you take me for?!
No thank you.
No creature can outmatch me!
I claim my mark!
We triumph once more!
Easy prey.
The cycle continues!
We are the Apex!
Predictable beast!
The hunt is spoiled by this abomination!
The victims of my past! They are countless!
All the choices I've made. The people I have hurt!
I have seen things much worse than the creatures we have fought. There is nothing to worry about.
This bird gives us an edge over our foes. We will prevail.
They are predictable, easy to outsmart.
It will sting at first, but it will heal quickly.
I spent my youth reading many texts. It has taught me this treatment method.
Bite onto this stick, this will hurt.
You are not dead, so stop acting like you are.
I tell no one, but I was once a fair maiden. I am proof that any can change for the better.
Do not be afraid, we have survived this long for a reason.
This is a waste of time! We should just pack up and retreat!
A wasted effort, I am hunted eternally and nothing will stop them.
I cannot play this game with you while the creatures still lurk in the darkness!
I cannot trust anyone, especially this band of greedy mercenaries!
I never offer my aid to those that do not deserve it.
Traitorous cur. I will be keeping my distance tonight.
Pain is natural, embrace it!
Let me help you develop that scar!
Another wound, another story!
Useless sheep. Why do I even bother?
This bird devotes itself to me. It is more worthy of life than any of you!
City folk, so helpless.
Oh the rations have gone missing? How strange indeed.
Oh this was yours? Well too bad.
You may complain all you want about my stealing habits, but that will not change anything.
I am too tired to continue living in this hell.
You know nothing of my misfortunes, of how it makes me want to stop...
Just...let me rest...
But we have not performed the proper rituals yet!
*chirping sounds*
Ah yes! First we must find Mother's nest!
Careful, I have set a trap, and it is not the quick killing kind.
Keep your distance if you want to keep your eyes.
Get too close and you will lose that hand.
They are not wounds, they are trophies!
No! Do not steal my scars!
You ditz! You are just making it worse!
You do not know what you are doing, so stop trying.
How silly of me. Kindness always reminds me of the terrible being I have become...
*sobbing* Maybe in another life, I will be more proud of what I am...
CAW!
Are you bird feed? No? THEN BE GONE!
I suspect this to be peppered in toxins.
City food is poisoned food.
Gotta stay light for the hunt tomorrow.
A hunter is more keen on the fast.
This bread is too kind for me. I could not accept such an offer...
Surely you are more hungry. I will give you my share...
It is not fermented quite yet, I shall wait until it is!
It seems I have misplaced my beak. I shall eat once I find it.

I have gathered what rations I could scrounge from these accursed lands.
Nothing will stalk us tonight, I will make sure of that.
Every arrow must be kept sharp. Every feather must be kept fresh.
An unseen predator is often the one to catch its prey.
The shadows can be an ally. What is not seen can be the deadliest weapon.

A hunter on the run, the Falconer focuses on using cunning tactics to gain an upper hand over her foes. While she is most proficient in the back ranks, the Falconer still has a variety of skills to help her survive in the face of her adversaries, whether that be with timely retreats or coordinated attacks with her avian companion.

The Falconer relies on her tactics to protect her. While her arrows and bird lack the damage potential of her allies’ weapons, she is the master of harassment and harrying attacks. She can maim her foes with well placed shots while her falcon wreaks havoc amongst the enemy ranks.

Hunted by Brigands that she once called allies, the Falconer has learned tactics to help her survive in the most perilous situations. She can blend into her surroundings and rely on her keen senses and falcon to ensure no creature catches her off-guard. Unfortunately the Falconer’s bounty follows her wherever she goes, and occasionally her party will find themselves awoken by killers sent by her former leader.
I have accepted my fate. I am ready.

Death has finally caught up with me...
What is this?! I am fading from reality!
Oh no! I have become a phantasm!
I have become see through, what am I to do?!
I am corporeal again. What a relief.
My sensations return. Phew...
I am no longer phantasmal. I hope that does not happen again...
I feel a sudden rush of cosmic adrenaline!
I can feel it! The thrill of the hunt!
The rush of combat! this is what I live for!
Damn, the high is wearing away...
I have calmed down, for now.
The bloodlust dissipates...
My skin hardens, I am unkillable!
I am protected by some heavenly aura!
I have grown a thick skin!
It is gone. Damn, I could have gotten used to that...
I am mortal again. That is a shame...
My skin softens...
Perhaps my unsettling state can be of use!
I am a ghastly hunter, stalking my prey in plain sight!
Despite my circumstances, I am able to take advantage of this situation!
This unseen boon continues!
I am protected once more!
This unknown force continues to shield me. Convenient.
Best to focus on my survival in this situation.
I must be wary of any fatal blows!
I must maintain a steady defense.
Pathetic beast! They are distracted by the bird's movements!
I am the master of harrassment. I will enjoy toying with these fools!
They are blinded, now is our chance!
Shots to the appendages, they will not strike properly!
Hah! They fear me, as they should!
Does my reputation precede me? They tremble with dispair!
I usually do not dabble in poisons, but I've made an exception of this lot.
I have set a trap of vulture's acid upon them. Watch as they suffer!
I have started using poison-tipped arrows, and the effects are beginning to set in!
Do not wait to be saved like some needy damsel, become the heroes you want to be!
I have no war trumpets on hand, but let the adrenaline of combat inspire you instead!
Life is a fight for survival, so fight on!
My body pushes itself beyond its limits!
I am becoming numb to pain!
Pain doesn't matter, so long as I survive!
Um, I do not sing. But if I did, know that it would be very calming!
You want me to sing? Trust me, you will find the sound of battle more relieving.
If I pluck the string of my bow, would that suffice for singing?

Nightmares and Unavoidable Ambushes

Some classes are haunted by their past. For example, the Shieldbreaker is scarred from past trauma. She must navigate a series of seven flashback battles while camping. (One battle per camp.) Once those battles are completed, she can camp peacefully forever.
NOTE: The seven flashbacks are shared across the whole Shieldbreaker class. You don't have to do seven battles for each Shieldbreaker recruit.
Beware the Carrion Queen!
The presence of corpses allows the Talon Mother to revitalize herself.
The leader of the Talon Brigands lurks in the darkness. Be wary!
The Talon Mother arrives, seeking revenge for the lives you have stolen!

W-what have I done?!
I-I didn't mean to! It was a mistake!
Innocent blood on my hands! I-I am a monster!
I am now no better than the beast I harbor!
I-it was self defense! I swear!
What have I done!? I am no better than a criminal!
She was an innocent soul! How can I live with myself given what I hath done!
Another innocent life taken by me. I haven't changed...
She reminded me of myself...and that terrifies me...
I have killed a defenseless soul, I am not fit for a warrior's death!
I did it again...I am damned to make this same mistake...
How can I represent law when I have snuffed out the life of an innocent!
Another for the count, but this one was not deserving of this cruelty...
Such a shame...I would have liked to have had her for myself...
I cherish life, but this place has turned me into a king of death...
I fight to protect the weak, yet I am the one to deal the killing blow...
She was unnecessary! She did not have to be sacrificed!
Erm, perhaps her cadaver can serve us later...
I am a symbol of holiness, but I feel I have done a devil's work...
- {colour_start|bleed}SHE HAD SOFT SKIN. I ONLY WISH WE HAD MORE TIME TO PLAY WITH HER.{colour_end} - ...
NO MATTER WHAT I DO, I CAN ONLY DESTROY!
I-I have spilt the blood of innocence! I should be damned for my sinful actions!

They found me. About time...
Ghosts of my past, come to right my wrongs...
Death has come for me again...
Wake up! They are upon us!
They've come for their toll. I am prepared.
A flock flies overhead. They are near.
They hide in the shadows. We will find no rest this night.
I can hear them coming. We must prepare for a fight to survive.

We are but rodents to these vultures!
We are the prey! This is their hunt!
N-no! I have survived gruesome predation all my life, it cannot end like this!
I-I am no hunter! I am a fool seeking a life unfit for me!
I was never fit for this life! I should have stayed the sheep that I am!
Back away! One of you is a traitor, I am sure!
Did she send you!? Treacherous cur dressed as saintly heroes!?
Brigands! ALL OF YOU!!!
Man is a terrible thing, I never should have travelled with you beasts!
Wolves in sheeps' clothing. I should have known.
I've afflicted so much pain on others, now it's my turn to suffer...
Scars of the body, to match the scars of the mind!
TAKE MY FLESH, YOU WRETCHES!
Pain will absolve me of my sins!
Pain is a gift to the living, and I cherish it!
You useless rabble! You could never have survived under the conditions I thrived in!
Stupid! ALL of you! No better than children!
You should have kept to your comfortable homes! Your soft upbringing is evident from your embarrassing flailing!
Your comfortable lives have made you all weak, no better than those pathetic damsels!
Unbelievable. My survival is being threatened by you thick-headed cretins!
To rely on anyone but myself would make me as weak as those unfortunate maidens!
I have survived many nights with only this bird. I will not begin to rely on a group of bumbling strangers!
Survival of the fittest they say...
You are all dead weight, and I will not hesitate to sacrifice your lives for mine.
I never cared for anyone but myself. That remains true to this moment!
The life I've lived... The death I've caused... I don't deserve to survive...
No matter what I do, I end up in the same place... A pet, performing a master's bidding...
I justified their deaths with my need to survive, but I see what it has made of me...
My hatred of weakness, of man, of myself... I want it all to end...
I will never have the life I want. It might as well end now...
CAW CAWWWWW!!!
Take flight! We can outlast them in the sky!
We are a cycle! We die and come back!
Do not fret, misfortuned damsel! I will save you from your grisly fate!
The ritual! WE FORGOT THE RITUAL!!!
These beasts will tire! We will survive!
We've survived this long! We will not fall today!
Strength and perseverance guarantees survival. We will fight on!
Let your spirits sing! Our cries will be remembered by all!
I am shaken by no beast, for I am the hunter and they are my prey!
Take the initiative! The first strike is all that matters!
The hunter rules from the apex!
We are the Apex, the ultimate hunters! We have nothing to fear from these unholy beasts!
I've survived this long through wit and spirit, I will not die now!
There is nothing terrible enough to break me, I have survived it all!
No matter the odds, I will survive through cunning and determination!
I've fought man and beast alike, this threat does not shake me!
We have the aid of a keen hunter on our side. We will prevail!
I have been on the receiving end of a hero's wrath, and I know that ours is a might to be feared!
See them as our prey, and you will strike with the mind of a predator!
The bird distracts our adversaries, now is your chance!
An opportunity presents itself! It is time for the killing blow!
They are vulnerable! Strike now!
I have endured a lifetime of torment. One more battle will not faze me!
I will survive where a lesser person would not!
Why do we risk our lives for this meaningless task!?
The bird fears these monsters, and we should too!
N-no! I don't want to die! Pleeeeasse!!
Man is the most dangerous predator of all, and I take great care to keep my distance from you lot!
Keep your distance, lest you want to lose an eye!
Your predatory gazes fail to hide your murderous intent!
Pain forges me into a greater hunter!
They suffered greatly before their deaths. I wish to experience the pain that they had!
More scars, MORE SCARS!!!
A life of comfort has made you all weak, and USELESS!
Make yourselves useful and KILL THEM ALREADY!
You are all weak, held down by meaningless self codes. You would serve better as worm food.
I've done all the work, the beast's prize belongs to me!
The bird obeys me as if I am its queen. You lot should do the same!
Cover me you dimwits! I am vulnerable to attack!
I have become an inhumane hunter, I have preyed on the weak for too long...
I thought myself higher than them, but now I see...
In each of their terrified faces, I saw a reflection of me...
A bird's brain is the largest of them all!
Why was I born of blood?! I wish to be one with the Mother!
MOTHER!!!
P-please! I will repent, just spare me!
Too close! TOO CLOSE!!!
I accept my subordinate role, now please let me live!
I will only feel safe if no one is at my back!
What are you trying to do?! Get in front of me!
I cannot distinguish friend from foe, so I will remain close to the exit!
Come closer! Let us fight like true beasts!
I willingly enter the predator's lair!
I always keep my distance, but that changes today!
They perform the mating dance! I will join them!
You challenge me?! I ACCEPT!
That creature looks delicious! Let me have a bite!
Oh shoot! I have forgotten my robin's hood! I will return shortly!
CAWWWWWW!
I sprout my feathers and fly!
Perhaps my sacrifice will provide justice for the countless lives I have taken...
Stay my friend, it is time I depart....
Enough running from my fate. I will not be remembered as a coward...
Please, there is so much I still need to do! So much I must answer for!
N-no! I am not ready for death! Not yet!
I am a slave to my survivalist instincts!
It is mine! MINE!
Back away from my prize!
It has my mark! It belongs to ME!
The quick survive!
You provoked them, so you will face them!
I have a chance at surviving, you do not.
I act a part that I should not. I was never meant to be the fearsome hunter that I am not!
I am but a mouse, ensnared in the gluttonous gaze of its predator!
I understand now, the paralyzing fear that those poor women felt in their final moments!
I will not aid allies that will soon turn to enemies!
I am too busy saving my own hide to take action!
No one can know what is truly best for me, so I look out only for myself.
Leave be, I aim to survive this, with or without you.
I will not blunder foolishly into their blows.
You go on. I prefer to observe from a safe position.
Every action I take only hurts more people. Why waste the effort?
*sob* Why do I always cry? I am pathetic...
I am a criminal that must be punished. I've accepted my fate, leave me.
You did not dance, so neither will I.
Do not provoke me, or I shall fly away!
I am a hawk in a nightgown. I must watch for my prey!
Every motion and word is a deceit! I can only trust my instincts!
Man is unpredictable, I take my own actions!
I am the arbiter of my own fate!
With tooth and nail, I fight as these beasts do!
Scratching and clawing, a vicious way to dispatch a foe!
Yes, YES! The pain drives my every action!
I mark, you kill. Simple enough for you dimwits?
Watch the master at work, you novices.
This is how it is done you fools!
To hell with your orders! I am a self-made hunter!
I listen to no one!
I have been obedient for too long! It is time I take matters into my own hands!
Come at me you beasts! End me!
It seems that I will need to get their attention.
Over here you terrible creatures!
CAAAAWWWWWW!!!
This is my territory, invader!
Are you dancing to my MATE?!
The Mother will come for me, and my death will not be swift!
I didn't mean to kill the poor lass. Now I am hounded day and night for it!
Noises in the dark! Have they come already!?
Someone is eating more than their share, I know it!
I would not be surprised if you were bribed to kill me. I will be vigilant tonight.
You look for moments of weakness from me, but you will find none!
Help me count my wounds! I have accrued many new ones!
I have taught the bird to peck at my scabs. The pain keeps me awake at night!
Ah yes, this will develop into a magnificent scar!
That's right. Rest comfortably like the city sheep you are.
Ungrateful lot. We are only alive because of my hard work!
All you lot do is eat, like a nest of fledgling birds.
I will eat what I want. To hell with sharing.
These rations are wasted on you, give them to me.
I gathered these rations, so they belong to me.
I am worse than many of the monsters we fight... How can you place your trust in me?
If you knew what I've done, you'd think me a monster too...
If you were to abandon me, I would not be surprised...
This will be my spot, do not intrude!
Where is a tall tree? I must make my nest.
I will ride upon my trusty falcon. He will carry me to the Hamlet tonight!
I am a target of assassination. I will make it well known!
Back away! I will become the diversion!
As the old tale goes, "Scars give me charm!"
End me already. I deserve to burn in the inferno for what I have done...
Save yourselves. My soul is too far gone...
This armor is too heavy! Better to be quick than sturdy!
*bares teeth* RA CACAAAAWWWWW!!!
You stalk a hunter. This fate is no one's fault but your own!
I led you to believe that you were the one stalking me!
How about I relieve you of those malicious eyes?
Think you caught me vulnerable? Think again!
I live by a simple code. "KILL THE WEAK."
I care not of the consequences! Your existence angers me and I will see you put to the dirt!
A fresh wound always gets the cowards moving!
You totter into my arrow's flight. This misfortune is a result of your stupidity!
Duck! Arrows fly in all directions!
It is time for the dance of arrows!
Ah yes! I can land my arrow on the bull's eye of that target dummy!
SCRAWWWCAWWWWW!
My quiver is full. I must stick these arrows within my own flesh!
A little pain is what I need to get the blood going!
I have done so much wrong. This will be the one thing I have ever done right...
If we seek to destroy evil, than I must be the first to go...
I am a tree! These arrows will be my branches!
Yes, bird! Land upon my face! It is a soft and comfortable resting place!
Trying to leave me for the vultures? Think again!
You got me into this mess, now you'll die for it!
Let the cycle start over...
The hunt is over, for all of us...
Run away? Why? The fun has just begun!
Scars are nothing to fear! They strengthen you!
THE DANCE IS NOT OVER!!!
WHERE IS MOTHER?! I WANT MY MOTHER!!!
Ah, no! I submit! Just let me live!
*crying* Nooooooooo!
You all let that hit me! TRAITORS!!!
Who shoved me?! One of you shoved me!
Why me?! Hit them instead! They are easier prey!
You idiots! PROTECT ME!!!
More, give me MORE!!!
Yes! This wound will be a worthy addition!
CAWWW!
FLY AWAY!!!
A test of power, but I am no man!
How was I hit?! I am flying!
Stop tormenting me you beasts! Just end it!
No! Stop! PLEASE!!!
Another one of your tricks, you traitors?!
You fooled me once! I will not fall for such a predictable act!
Come now beast, I am standing right here!
Give me your wrath, you horrible thing!
A mighty dance indeed!
Silly creature! You cannot strike me while I am in the sky!
That was mine you thief!
That beast had my mark on it you ditz!
Wrong! All WRONG!!!
Do you not know where the sharp end goes?!
Such clumsy form! You got all the moves wrong!
You move like one of us, but can you FLY like one of us?!
There is no slaying it! We must flee!
It is futile, these beasts do not die!
Is this some cruel act?! Are you all against me?!
I cannot trust what I see in this hell!
Watch it you oaf! You nearly hit me!
Look at you, tripping on your own feet. Laughable.
Good thing I wasn't relying on you to land a blow.
Bunch of useless rabble. At least the criminals and cutthroats were competent.
Silly man, thinking it can hit a bird!
MOTHER!!! THIS ONE IS RUINING THE FUN FOR ME!!!!
They save me for last! A sadistic punishment for the dark deeds I have done!
I cannot bare this! I do not want to suffer in my last moments!
A clever act, but I will not fall for it!
Good, saving me the trouble later.
That wound will grow into a beautiful scar!
I would give anything to be in your place right now!
The weak die. Simple as that.
You make your pain obvious with your whimpering. You are weak.
You have been chosen!
*curious staring*
Those sadistic creatures! They continue to toy with me in the wake of my imminent demise!
N-no! Please! I yield! Spare me the pain of death!
Your silly ruses do not trick me, TRAITORS!
They are in league, the proof is everywhere!
You all dance horribly, watch me closely!
Your feet are saddened. They must be appeased to achieve the flow of the dance!
N-no! Do not touch me! I am consumed by past fears!
*sobbing* Noooo! Do not look at me! I am pathetic!
What are you doing?! Do not touch me with your filthy hands!
Keep your distance, or I will place an arrow in your knee!
To move would distract me from the pain...
I am fine to bleed here.
Where are you going?! Stay in your place, sheep!
I am a self made hunter. I will not take orders from a weakling like you!
My space! YOU ARE IN MY SPACE!!!
Mother told me to avoid outsiders.
Another tactic in your conspiracy, eh?
What is this? Some malign creation of science? No thanks.
No no no. This would relieve the pain. I want to ENHANCE it.
Why would I numb myself to pain? It is a natural gift to us all!
I am a criminal. I do not deserve this kindness...
I am sure this is well deserved for someone other than myself...
Ooh, that would only ruffle my feathers!
I would have to ask Mother first!
A deception that I will not fall for.
Anything not of nature is poison to me.
I can care for myself. Keep your witchery away from me!
Do not interrupt my pleasure!
I pity you, oblivious to such easy delights!
No! This will be my favorite wound!
Please, do not prolong my suffering...
It is hopeless, leave me...
Please, save yourself...
Witchcraft!
CAWW CAWWW!
*loud screeching*
Readying me for the kill are you?
Ha! How foolish you must think I am!
Hands off.
I draw all the strength I need from this pain!
Spilled blood fuels my will!
Pain is all I need.
I have no motivation within me. Do not try to change me otherwise.
You are too kind. Save your aid for someone more worthy...
I am doomed to a grisly fate. Your efforts would be wasted...
What? No dance first?
What do you take me for?!
No thank you.
No creature can outmatch me!
I claim my mark!
We triumph once more!
Easy prey.
The cycle continues!
We are the Apex!
Predictable beast!
The hunt is spoiled by this abomination!
The victims of my past! They are countless!
All the choices I've made. The people I have hurt!
I have seen things much worse than the creatures we have fought. There is nothing to worry about.
This bird gives us an edge over our foes. We will prevail.
They are predictable, easy to outsmart.
It will sting at first, but it will heal quickly.
I spent my youth reading many texts. It has taught me this treatment method.
Bite onto this stick, this will hurt.
You are not dead, so stop acting like you are.
I tell no one, but I was once a fair maiden. I am proof that any can change for the better.
Do not be afraid, we have survived this long for a reason.
This is a waste of time! We should just pack up and retreat!
A wasted effort, I am hunted eternally and nothing will stop them.
I cannot play this game with you while the creatures still lurk in the darkness!
I cannot trust anyone, especially this band of greedy mercenaries!
I never offer my aid to those that do not deserve it.
Traitorous cur. I will be keeping my distance tonight.
Pain is natural, embrace it!
Let me help you develop that scar!
Another wound, another story!
Useless sheep. Why do I even bother?
This bird devotes itself to me. It is more worthy of life than any of you!
City folk, so helpless.
Oh the rations have gone missing? How strange indeed.
Oh this was yours? Well too bad.
You may complain all you want about my stealing habits, but that will not change anything.
I am too tired to continue living in this hell.
You know nothing of my misfortunes, of how it makes me want to stop...
Just...let me rest...
But we have not performed the proper rituals yet!
*chirping sounds*
Ah yes! First we must find Mother's nest!
Careful, I have set a trap, and it is not the quick killing kind.
Keep your distance if you want to keep your eyes.
Get too close and you will lose that hand.
They are not wounds, they are trophies!
No! Do not steal my scars!
You ditz! You are just making it worse!
You do not know what you are doing, so stop trying.
How silly of me. Kindness always reminds me of the terrible being I have become...
*sobbing* Maybe in another life, I will be more proud of what I am...
CAW!
Are you bird feed? No? THEN BE GONE!
I suspect this to be peppered in toxins.
City food is poisoned food.
Gotta stay light for the hunt tomorrow.
A hunter is more keen on the fast.
This bread is too kind for me. I could not accept such an offer...
Surely you are more hungry. I will give you my share...
It is not fermented quite yet, I shall wait until it is!
It seems I have misplaced my beak. I shall eat once I find it.

I have gathered what rations I could scrounge from these accursed lands.
Nothing will stalk us tonight, I will make sure of that.
Every arrow must be kept sharp. Every feather must be kept fresh.
An unseen predator is often the one to catch its prey.
The shadows can be an ally. What is not seen can be the deadliest weapon.

A hunter on the run, the Falconer focuses on using cunning tactics to gain an upper hand over her foes. While she is most proficient in the back ranks, the Falconer still has a variety of skills to help her survive in the face of her adversaries, whether that be with timely retreats or coordinated attacks with her avian companion.

The Falconer relies on her tactics to protect her. While her arrows and bird lack the damage potential of her allies’ weapons, she is the master of harassment and harrying attacks. She can maim her foes with well placed shots while her falcon wreaks havoc amongst the enemy ranks.

Hunted by Brigands that she once called allies, the Falconer has learned tactics to help her survive in the most perilous situations. She can blend into her surroundings and rely on her keen senses and falcon to ensure no creature catches her off-guard. Unfortunately the Falconer’s bounty follows her wherever she goes, and occasionally her party will find themselves awoken by killers sent by her former leader.
I have accepted my fate. I am ready.

She is a killer that has committed unknowable crimes, but she seeks protection from an even greater threat...
Unexpected Allies
While their crimes against the Hamlet cannot be forgiven, their knowledge of the surrounding areas and of the enemy will prove invaluable.

Death has finally caught up with me...
What is this?! I am fading from reality!
Oh no! I have become a phantasm!
I have become see through, what am I to do?!
I am corporeal again. What a relief.
My sensations return. Phew...
I am no longer phantasmal. I hope that does not happen again...
I feel a sudden rush of cosmic adrenaline!
I can feel it! The thrill of the hunt!
The rush of combat! this is what I live for!
Damn, the high is wearing away...
I have calmed down, for now.
The bloodlust dissipates...
My skin hardens, I am unkillable!
I am protected by some heavenly aura!
I have grown a thick skin!
It is gone. Damn, I could have gotten used to that...
I am mortal again. That is a shame...
My skin softens...
Perhaps my unsettling state can be of use!
I am a ghastly hunter, stalking my prey in plain sight!
Despite my circumstances, I am able to take advantage of this situation!
This unseen boon continues!
I am protected once more!
This unknown force continues to shield me. Convenient.
Best to focus on my survival in this situation.
I must be wary of any fatal blows!
I must maintain a steady defense.
Pathetic beast! They are distracted by the bird's movements!
I am the master of harrassment. I will enjoy toying with these fools!
They are blinded, now is our chance!
Shots to the appendages, they will not strike properly!
Hah! They fear me, as they should!
Does my reputation precede me? They tremble with dispair!
I usually do not dabble in poisons, but I've made an exception of this lot.
I have set a trap of vulture's acid upon them. Watch as they suffer!
I have started using poison-tipped arrows, and the effects are beginning to set in!
Do not wait to be saved like some needy damsel, become the heroes you want to be!
I have no war trumpets on hand, but let the adrenaline of combat inspire you instead!
Life is a fight for survival, so fight on!
My body pushes itself beyond its limits!
I am becoming numb to pain!
Pain doesn't matter, so long as I survive!
Um, I do not sing. But if I did, know that it would be very calming!
You want me to sing? Trust me, you will find the sound of battle more relieving.
If I pluck the string of my bow, would that suffice for singing?

Nightmares and Unavoidable Ambushes

Some classes are haunted by their past. For example, the Shieldbreaker is scarred from past trauma. She must navigate a series of seven flashback battles while camping. (One battle per camp.) Once those battles are completed, she can camp peacefully forever.
NOTE: The seven flashbacks are shared across the whole Shieldbreaker class. You don't have to do seven battles for each Shieldbreaker recruit.
Beware the Carrion Queen!
The presence of corpses allows the Talon Mother to revitalize herself.
The leader of the Talon Brigands lurks in the darkness. Be wary!
The Talon Mother arrives, seeking revenge for the lives you have stolen!

W-what have I done?!
I-I didn't mean to! It was a mistake!
Innocent blood on my hands! I-I am a monster!
I am now no better than the beast I harbor!
I-it was self defense! I swear!
What have I done!? I am no better than a criminal!
She was an innocent soul! How can I live with myself given what I hath done!
Another innocent life taken by me. I haven't changed...
She reminded me of myself...and that terrifies me...
I have killed a defenseless soul, I am not fit for a warrior's death!
I did it again...I am damned to make this same mistake...
How can I represent law when I have snuffed out the life of an innocent!
Another for the count, but this one was not deserving of this cruelty...
Such a shame...I would have liked to have had her for myself...
I cherish life, but this place has turned me into a king of death...
I fight to protect the weak, yet I am the one to deal the killing blow...
She was unnecessary! She did not have to be sacrificed!
Erm, perhaps her cadaver can serve us later...
I am a symbol of holiness, but I feel I have done a devil's work...
- {colour_start|bleed}SHE HAD SOFT SKIN. I ONLY WISH WE HAD MORE TIME TO PLAY WITH HER.{colour_end} - ...
NO MATTER WHAT I DO, I CAN ONLY DESTROY!
I-I have spilt the blood of innocence! I should be damned for my sinful actions!

They found me. About time...
Ghosts of my past, come to right my wrongs...
Death has come for me again...
Wake up! They are upon us!
They've come for their toll. I am prepared.
A flock flies overhead. They are near.
They hide in the shadows. We will find no rest this night.
I can hear them coming. We must prepare for a fight to survive.
